title: Three
description: When Brad has to go away for business, he asks his brother Paul--the man he trusts most in the world, his best friend--to keep his new wife, Jolie, busy. When Brad's job puts him on the road more than he is home, Paul and Jolie's easy camaraderie becomes tinged with desire and lust, at least on Paul's part.Paul confesses his feelings for Jolie to his brother, fully expecting his wrath. Brad, however, once the shock wears off, has other ideas for Paul and Jolie.Applying a little lustful logic, will Paul's idea save their marriage, save Brad and Jolie's friendship? Can the three survive their desires and feelings and remain an intact family? Will Brad give in to his feelings, and does Jolie even feel the same?Pick up a copy today to find out the answers to all these questions...Warning: This book contains erotic, sexual situations, sexual language, and adult language.
author: Michelle Devon
